title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: INTRODUCTION$NOAH coin is a pioneering cryptocurrency project dedicated to empowering humanity, protecting animals, and fostering a sustainable world. Our mission is to utilize blockchain technology to create positive change in society, demonstrating the potential of cryptocurrency beyond the financial realm.VISIONIn a world of growing environmental and societal challenges, we aim to make a tangible impact by using the unique capabilities of blockchain and cryptocurrency. $NOAH coin was created with the belief that cryptocurrency can empower philanthropic endeavors in unique ways, providing a decentralized, transparent, and efficient means of contributing to the global good.ROADMAPSTAGE 1: LaunchOur initial stage revolves around building a strong foundation for the $NOAH coin project. During this phase, we:Launch $NOAH coin.List $NOAH coin on CoinGecko and CoinMarketCap to increase market visibility.Establish a community on Telegram and Twitter, offering a platform for our supporters to connect, share ideas, and stay updated on our progress.STAGE 2: GrowthWith a solid foundation, the project focuses on expansion and increased visibility within the crypto space. Key goals for this phase include:Update DexTools to provide accurate and real-time information about $NOAH coin.Pursue listings on various Centralized Exchanges (CEX) to improve liquidity and accessibility of $NOAH coin.Conduct an independent audit of $NOAH coin to ensure transparency, trust, and security in our platform and operationsSTAGE 3: Social ImpactOur final stage is about making a tangible difference. We aim to channel the success and support we've gained into the following initiatives:Start a charity organization dedicated to our core missions: empowering humanity, protecting animals, and fostering a sustainable world.Develop programs and partnerships aimed at helping humans, such as poverty alleviation, education, and health initiatives.Launch initiatives to protect and support animals, both domestic and wildlife, emphasizing sustainability.$NOAH coin is a community-driven project that values transparency, collaboration, and active participation. Join us on our journey by becoming a part of our community. You can find us and stay updated on our progress at https://t.me/noahcoineth.SOCIALSWebsite: https://noahcoineth.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/noahcoinethTelegram:https://t.me/noahcoinethChart: https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0xd725053d091fcf8c5f38768b5902cc01b28e546bSwap: https://app.uniswap.org/#/swap?outputCurrency=0x1185fEc4Ebc130629198849CE1675a936Dfb37b5
